segments.text: Three other people started to bid . One called himself Buddhabuyer , so I knew he meant business . I raised my bid twice , but it kept going up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How high did the price go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . I dropped out at $ 250 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You didn't watch the end of the auction ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . It wasn't the super bargain I thought it was .
segments.speaker: S1
